thread.title: Three more schools strip Bill Cosby of honorary degrees
thread.title_full: Three more schools strip Bill Cosby of honorary degrees

title: Three more schools strip Bill Cosby of honorary degrees
text:
Three more schools strip Bill Cosby of honorary degrees Updated: It's a sad day for Old Hollywood. More > It's a sad day for Old Hollywood. More > Scott Disick has checked into a Malibu rehab center for drug and alcohol addiction, UsWeekly reports. More > Scott Disick has checked into a Malibu rehab center for drug and alcohol addiction, UsWeekly reports. More > The Kardashian and Odom families speak out as Lamar Odom remains in critical condition Lamar Odom's children have released a statement thanking fans for prayers for their father, who remains in critical condition after being found unconscious on Tuesday. More > Lamar Odom's children have released a statement thanking fans for prayers for their father, who remains in critical condition after being found unconscious on Tuesday. More > More schools are trying to distance themselves from Bill Cosby. More > More schools are trying to distance themselves from Bill Cosby. More > Lamar Odom reportedly overdosed on drugs Drugs were found in Lamar Odom's system after he was found unconscious at a Nevada brothel, E! News reports. More > Drugs were found in Lamar Odom's system after he was found unconscious at a Nevada brothel, E! News reports. More > Khloe Kardashian is making medical decisions on Lamar Odom's behalf Things are not looking good for Lamar Odom and the Kardashian family. Odom is currently in a coma and remains unresponsive in a Las Vegas hospital. More > Things are not looking good for Lamar Odom and the Kardashian family. Odom is currently in a coma and remains unresponsive in a Las Vegas hospital. More > John Stamos charged with DUI John Stamos has been officially charged with one count of driving under the influence in relation to his arrest in June, TMZ reports. More > John Stamos has been officially charged with one count of driving under the influence in relation to his arrest in June, TMZ reports. More > Hayden Panettiere enters treatment center for postpartum depression After struggling with postpartum depression since the birth of her daughter, Hayden Panettiere is reaching out for a helping hand. More > After struggling with postpartum depression since the birth of her daughter, Hayden Panettiere is reaching out for a helping hand. More > Lamar Odom has been found unconscious and unable to breathe at a Nevada brothel, TMZ reports. More > Lamar Odom has been found unconscious and unable to breathe at a Nevada brothel, TMZ reports. More > 
By Jessica Roy, 
More schools are trying to distance themselves from Bill Cosby . 
Less than a month after two schools revoked the comedian's honorary degrees, another three -- Tufts University, Lehigh University, and Goucher College -- have announced they are rescinding them as of this week, the Associated Press reported Thursday. 
Tufts University of Medford, Mass., is withdrawing an honorary doctorate they gave Cosby in 2000, as well as an award for children's entertainment that they gave him in 2011. Goucher College of Baltimore, Mass., is taking back the honorary degree they conferred upon him in 2001. Lehigh University of Bethlehem, Penn., rescinded an honorary degree given to Cosby in 2005. 
The Bill Cosby rape allegations: A timeline of bad behavior 
In September, Fordham and Marquette took back their honorary degrees. In 2014, Spelman College suspended a professorship funded by Cosby. UMass-Amherst cut all ties with Cosby (who is an alum of the school) in November of last year, and he voluntarily stepped down from the board of trustees at Temple University a couple weeks later. 
A statue of the comedian was removed from Disney World's MGM Hollywood Studios park this past July. 
Over the course of the last year, more than 40 women have accused Bill Cosby of a variety of inappropriate behaviors, including sexual assault, covertly administering drugs, and rape. He has not been formally charged with any crimes.
